channel.title: Trends on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Trends on PepsFeeder

item.title: This Everyday Household Item Surprisingly Caused A Terrible Home Fire
item.description: Dave' s worst nightmare became a reality when his house was tragically set ablaze by a discarded 9-volt battery. These batteries are normally found in smoke detectors but can cause some serious damage.

item.title: Man Challenges Gaston To A Push-Up Competition, Only To Get A Humbling Surprise
item.description: The actor playing Beauty and the Beastâ€™ s Gaston at Disney World in Orlando is known for his bravado, especially after a video of a little girl putting him in his place went viral last month.

item.title: Watch As An Octopus Stuck In A Jar Unscrews The Lid From The Inside
item.description: If you ever wanted to see how an octopus responds in a rather tough situation, you’re in luck. The clip below shows an octopus being placed in a glass jar, with the lid screwed back on tight to close the creature inside.

item.title: Little Girl Gets Scolded By An Abusive Teacher, Only To Kick Him In The Crotch
item.description: This aggressive teacher in Russia will probably think twice before humiliating another kid in his class again. He was rightfully put in his place after one little girl kicked him in the groin for his abusive behavior.

item.title: Doctors Believed That Their Prematurely Born Baby Would Die, But This Miracle Happened
item.description: Kate Ogg and her husband David were thrilled to be told that, after years of trying to get pregnant, they were going to have two babies!

item.title: This May Look Like A Colorful Mess, But Just Watch What Happens To It
item.description: Food should be fun. This is especially true for cakes and desserts. Yet no dessert is as much fun to make as this groovy and colorful cake.

item.title: By Mixing Peanut Butter And Honey, You Can Create A Simple And Delicious Treat
item.description: Granola bars are always a great option for an afternoon snack. They are quick, tasty, and healthy (well, most of the time). Some of the cheaper, store-bought bars contain a ton of high fructose corn syrup.
